params._initialOwner: The address of the initial owner (governance contract).
params._priceDecayHalfLife: The initial price decay half-life for auctions.
params._startPriceMultiplier: The initial start price multiplier for auctions.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._newHalfLife: The new price decay half-life in seconds.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

minCollateralizationRatio().notice: The minimum collateralization ratio required for a Vault (e.g., 150 for 150%).

priceDecayHalfLife().notice: The time in seconds it takes for the auction price to halve in the LiquidationManager.

setPriceDecayHalfLife(uint256).notice: Updates the price decay half-life for auctions.

setStartPriceMultiplier(uint256).notice: Updates the start price multiplier for auctions.

startPriceMultiplier().notice: Multiplier for the starting price of collateral in an auction (e.g., 150 for 150%).
